thread.title: Nicki Minaj flashes cleavage on Instagram | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Nicki Minaj flashes cleavage on Instagram | Daily Mail Online

author: Christine Rendon For Dailymail.Com
title: Nicki Minaj flashes cleavage on Instagram | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share Nicki also wore a white robe and a pair of red slip-on shoes, signalling she perhaps took the snap just after getting made up in the makeup chair. The chart-topper rocked the same ensemble in a snap she shared one day earlier. All eyes on Minaj: In the photo, Nicki wore a metallic mask as she sat cross-legged in a pair of thigh high boots, which she captioned, 'McQueen' In the photo, Nicki wore a metallic mask as she sat cross-legged in a pair of thigh high boots, which she captioned, 'McQueen.' Meanwhile, Nicki is spending a bundle on a new security system for her L.A. mansion following a significant burglary earlier in the week, according to TMZ . Not only was $200,000 worth of jewelry and other property stolen from the posh home, which she has been renting for $30,000 a month, but the place was 'trashed,' according to the Thursday report. The property: Meanwhile, Nicki is spending a bundle on a new security system for her L.A. mansion following a significant burglary earlier in the week, according to TMZ No suspects have been arrested yet, but police believe the crime may have been committed by someone who knows the 34-year-old singer. Meanwhile, Nicki also posted a snap of herself with hip hop artist Gucci Mane on Wednesday. The image was of the pair posing beside a red car, which Gucci shared as well and captioned, 'Salute and much respect to @nickiminaj Zone6 stand up!!! #staytuned Legendary.' The image comes three years after Gucci had a Twitter feud with Nicki, but, by the looks of their latest snap, that all seems to be under the bridge now. Gucci and Nicki have previously collaborated on a remix of the Yo Gotti song, 5 Star B*tch. Meanwhile: Nicki also posted a snap of herself with Gucci Mane on Wednesday
